heading: Welcome in Visio
joinInputError: Use a meeting link or code. Examples:
joinMeetingTipContent: You can join a meeting by pasting its full link in the browser's address bar.

createMenu.laterOption: Create a meeting for a later date

laterMeetingDialog.heading: Your connection details
laterMeetingDialog.description: Send this link to the people you want to invite to the meeting. They will be able to join without Agent Connect.
laterMeetingDialog.permissions: People with this link do not need your permission to join this meeting.
